statements: SELECT * FROM healthcare_provider_performance_metrics WHERE provider_id = 12345;
SELECT provider_name, patient_count FROM healthcare_provider_performance_metrics ORDER BY patient_satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT AVG(avg_response_time) FROM healthcare_provider_performance_metrics GROUP BY provider_name;
SELECT provider_name, avg_billing_amount FROM healthcare_provider_performance_metrics WHERE patient_count > 100 ORDER BY avg_billing_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_provider_performance_metrics WHERE patient_satisfaction_score BETWEEN 4.0 AND 5.0;
SELECT provider_name, patient_count, patient_satisfaction_score FROM healthcare_provider_performance_metrics ORDER BY patient_satisfaction_score DESC, patient_count ASC
SELECT * FROM healthcare_provider_performance_metrics WHERE avg_billing_amount > 5000 ORDER BY avg_billing_amount DESC
SELECT provider_name, avg_response_time FROM healthcare_provider_performance_metrics WHERE patient_count > 100 ORDER BY provider_name

SELECT provider_name, patient_count, patient_satisfaction_score, avg_billing_amount FROM healthcare_provider_performance_metrics WHERE patient_satisfaction_score >= 4.5 AND avg_billing_amount < 8000 ORDER BY avg_billing_amount ASC
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, patient_count, patient_satisfaction_score, avg_response_time, avg_billing_amount FROM healthcare_provider_performance_metrics ORDER BY provider_id ASC
SELECT * FROM providers;
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty FROM providers ORDER BY provider_specialty DESC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM providers WHERE provider_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_providers FROM providers;
SELECT provider_name, metric_name, metric_value FROM providers INNER JOIN performance_metrics ON providers.provider_id = performance_metrics.provider_id;
SELECT * FROM providers;
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty FROM providers WHERE provider_location = 'New York';
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty, provider_location FROM providers ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT provider_name, AVG(metric_value) AS avg_metric_value FROM providers JOIN performance_metrics ON providers.provider_id = performance_metrics.provider_id GROUP BY provider_name;
SELECT DISTINCT provider_location FROM providers;
SELECT * FROM Healthcare_Providers;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM Healthcare_Providers WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Patient_Records WHERE diagnosis LIKE 'Cancer%';
SELECT provider_id, COUNT(patient_id) AS patients_visited FROM Patient_Records GROUP BY provider_id;
SELECT metric_name, AVG(metric_value) AS avg_value FROM Performance_Metrics GROUP BY metric_name;
SELECT provider_name, specialty, location FROM Healthcare_Providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, visit_date FROM Patient_Records WHERE visit_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT provider_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM Performance_Metrics WHERE metric_value > 80.0 ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patient_Records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%' ORDER BY provider_id ASC, visit_date DESC;

SELECT provider_name, location, performance_score FROM Healthcare_Providers JOIN Performance_Metrics ON Healthcare_Providers.provider_id = Performance_Metrics.provider_id WHERE performance_score > 90.0 AND metric_name = 'Patient Satisfaction' ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM doctors ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE experience > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT specialty FROM doctors;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT appointment_date, status FROM appointments WHERE status = 'confirmed';
SELECT * FROM doctors WHERE specialty='Cardiology';
SELECT id, name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 40 ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT doctors.name, patients.name, appointments.appointment_date FROM doctors INNER JOIN appointments ON doctors.id = appointments.doctor_id INNER JOIN patients ON patients.id = appointments.patient_id WHERE appointments.status='Scheduled' ORDER BY appointments.appointment_date ASC;
SELECT doctors.name, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM doctors INNER JOIN performance_metrics ON doctors.id = performance_metrics.doctor_id GROUP BY doctors.name HAVING AVG(rating) > 3;
SELECT doctors.name, COUNT(appointments.id) AS total_appointments FROM doctors LEFT JOIN appointments ON doctors.id = appointments.doctor_id GROUP BY doctors.name ORDER BY total_appointments DESC;
SELECT * FROM Healthcare_Providers ORDER BY provider_id DESC;
SELECT provider_name, location FROM Healthcare_Providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM Patient_Visits WHERE visit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT provider_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM Performance_Metrics WHERE metric_value > 0.8;
SELECT plan_name, plan_description FROM Quality_Improvement_Plans WHERE provider_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Healthcare_Providers WHERE specialty='Cardiology';
SELECT provider_name, location FROM Healthcare_Providers WHERE specialty='Orthopedics' ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT provider_id, provider_name FROM Healthcare_Providers WHERE location='New York' AND specialty='Dermatology';
SELECT * FROM Patient_Visits WHERE diagnosis='Hypertension' ORDER BY visit_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT provider_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM Performance_Metrics WHERE metric_value > 90 ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
